title: Bloomberg Law Brief: The Future of the Supreme Court  (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: The Future of the Supreme Court  (Audio)
description:
James Harvie Wilkinson III, a judge for the fourth circuit U.S. Court of Appeals, discusses Donald Trump’s choice of Neil Gorsuch to replace Antonin Scalia on the Supreme Court, as well as the future of American jurisprudence. He speaks with June Grasso and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
